1.name: Nature's Wrath
1.details: Quill can hear the wind's whisper to tell where the nearby enemies are even without vision.

2.name: Piercing Arrow
2.details:
Quill charges up a piercing arrow, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit when released, and reduced damage to the rest of the enemies hit.

The damage and range increased based on the charge duration.

3.name: Hail of Arrows
3.details: Quill fires a hail of arrows at a target location, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit and reducing their movement speed.

4.name: Light Breeze
4.details:
Quill dashes to a target direction and can still cast Piercing Arrow or Hail of Arrows during the dash.

Hitting an enemy Hero reduces the cooldowns of Light Breeze.

5.name: Tailwind
5.details:
Quill creates a field for a duration that increases her and alliesâ€™ movement speed.

In addition, she also gains a large amount of attack speed.
